com.wikitude.common.tracking

Interface TrackingMapRecorder


  • public interface TrackingMapRecorder
    Use the TrackingMapRecorder to record 3D Tracking Maps. The result will be a file which you first export and then package with your app.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelRecording()
      Cancels the currently running recording.
      java.io.File getTrackingMapStorageLocation()
      Returns the file path to where the Wikitude SDK saves all map recordings.
      boolean isRecording() 
      void registerTrackingMapRecorderEventListener(TrackingMapRecorderEventListener listener)
      Register a TrackingMapRecorderEventListener with this TrackingMapRecorder.
      void startRecording()
      Starts a new Tracking Map recording.
      void stopRecording(java.lang.String filename)
      Stops the current Tracking Map recording.
      void trackingMapRecordingDidUpdate(RecognizedTarget recognizedTarget) 

    • Method Detail

      • startRecording

        void startRecording()
        Starts a new Tracking Map recording.

      • stopRecording

        void stopRecording(java.lang.String filename)
        Stops the current Tracking Map recording. The map will be saved and TrackingMapRecorderEventListeners will be notified on completion. The file will be written to the application cache directory, please extract the file from the device and bundle it in your app assets.

      • cancelRecording

        void cancelRecording()
        Cancels the currently running recording. After the cancel request was successful the onTrackingMapRecordingCanceled callback method will be called.

      • registerTrackingMapRecorderEventListener

        void registerTrackingMapRecorderEventListener(TrackingMapRecorderEventListener listener)
        Register a TrackingMapRecorderEventListener with this TrackingMapRecorder. After the TrackingMapRecorder finished writing the tracking map to file all it's listeners will be notified and handed the path to the file.
        Parameters:
        listener - TrackingMapRecorderEventListener instance

      • getTrackingMapStorageLocation

        java.io.File getTrackingMapStorageLocation()
        Returns the file path to where the Wikitude SDK saves all map recordings.
        Returns:
        File path to the map recordings

      • trackingMapRecordingDidUpdate

        void trackingMapRecordingDidUpdate(RecognizedTarget recognizedTarget)

      • isRecording

        boolean isRecording()
